title: New Play Store policy will kill third-party call recording apps starting May 11
content:
The built-in call recorder is a staple of custom OEM skins such as MIUI and ColorOS. It also comes pre-loaded on Google Pixel phones, integrated into the Phone app. But it isn’t universally available on Android phones due to regional laws. In case your phone doesnâ€™t have the functionality, you can always install a third-party

The post New Play Store policy will kill third-party call recording apps starting May 11 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: An upcoming Google Play Policy change will kill all third-party call recording apps once and for all. Read on to know more.
